headline: McDonald’s Shares Slump as GLP-1 Risks Spur Rare Sell Rating
summary: (Bloomberg) -- McDonald’s Corp. shares slumped on Tuesday after Redburn Atlantic slapped the burger chain with its sole sell rating, saying shifting consumer patterns due to weight-loss drugs and inflation are cause for concern.Most Read from BloombergTrump Said He Fired the National Portrait Gallery Director. headline: OLO Q1 Earnings Call: Product Expansion and New Wins Shape 2025 Outlook
summary: Restaurant software company (NYSE:OLO) reported Q1 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 21.3% year on year to $80.68 million. Guidance for next quarter’s revenue was better than expected at $82.25 million at the midpoint, 0.5% above analysts’ estimates. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.07 per share was in line with analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Brinker International: Mature Brand, Fresh Strategy, 8% Yield Potential
summary: Brinker International is showing strong same-store sales growth and improved margins through operational optimizations. Check out why I rate EAT stock a buy.
